verses.verse: And when <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6166>Arad<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanite,<s%> which <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> in the <S%H5045>south,<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> tell that <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H871>spies;<s%> then he <S%H3898>fought<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> some of them <S%H7628>prisoners.<s%>

And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5087>vowed<s%> a <S%H5088>vow<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> you will <S%H389>indeed<s%> <S%H5414>deliver<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> into my <S%H3027>hand,<s%> then I will utterly <S%H2763>destroy<s%> their <S%H5892>cities.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8085>listened<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H5414>delivered<s%> up the <S%H3669>Canaanites;<s%> and they utterly <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> them and their <S%H5892>cities:<s%> and he <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H2767>Hormah.<s%>

And they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2023>Hor<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>sea,<s%> to <S%H5437>compass<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H123>Edom:<s%> and the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> was <S%H7114>much<s%> <S%H7114>discouraged<s%> because of the <S%H1870>way.<s%>

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> against <S%H430>God,<s%> and against <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H4100>Why<s%> have you <S%H5927>brought<s%> us up out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H4191>die<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness?<s%> for there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H3899>bread,<s%> <S%H369>neither<s%> is there any <S%H4325>water;<s%> and our <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H6973>loathes<s%> this <S%H7052>light<s%> <S%H3899>bread.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H8314>fiery<s%> <S%H5175>serpents<s%> among the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and they <S%H5391>bit<s%> the <S%H5971>people;<s%> and <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H4191>died.<s%>

Therefore the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> We have <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> for we have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and against you; <S%H6419>pray<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that he <S%H5493>take<s%> away the <S%H5175>serpents<s%> from us. And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6419>prayed<s%> for the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H6213>Make<s%> you a <S%H8314>fiery<s%> <S%H8314>serpent,<s%> and <S%H7760>set<s%> it on a <S%H5251>pole:<s%> and it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, that <S%H3605>every<s%> one that is <S%H5391>bitten,<s%> when he <S%H7200>looks<s%> on it, shall <S%H2425>live.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H5175>serpent<s%> of <S%H5178>brass,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> it on a <S%H5251>pole,<s%> and it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, that <S%H518>if<s%> a <S%H5175>serpent<s%> had <S%H5391>bitten<s%> any <S%H376>man,<s%> when he <S%H5027>beheld<s%> the <S%H5175>serpent<s%> of <S%H5178>brass,<s%> he <S%H2425>lived.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5265>set<s%> <S%H5265>forward,<s%> and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in <S%H88>Oboth.<s%>

And they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from <S%H88>Oboth,<s%> and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> at <S%H5863>Ijeabarim,<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> toward the sun <S%H4217>rise.<s%>
From <S%H8033>there<s%> they <S%H5265>removed,<s%> and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in the <S%H5158>valley<s%> of <S%H2218>Zared.<s%>

From <S%H8033>there<s%> they <S%H5265>removed,<s%> and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H5676>other<s%> <S%H5676>side<s%> of <S%H769>Arnon,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> that <S%H3318>comes<s%> out of the <S%H1366>coasts<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites:<s%> for <S%H769>Arnon<s%> is the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H4124>Moab<s%> and the <S%H567>Amorites.<s%>

<S%H5921>Why<s%> <S%H3651><s%> it is <S%H559>said<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H4421>wars<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H853>What<s%> he <S%H2052>did<s%> in the <S%H5492>Red<s%> sea, and in the <S%H5158>brooks<s%> of <S%H769>Arnon,<s%>

And at the <S%H793>stream<s%> of the <S%H5158>brooks<s%> that <S%H5186>goes<s%> <S%H5186>down<s%> to the <S%H3427>dwelling<s%> of <S%H6144>Ar,<s%> and <S%H8172>lies<s%> on the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab.<s%>

And from <S%H8033>there<s%> they went to <S%H876>Beer:<s%> that is the <S%H875>well<s%> <S%H834>whereof<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H622>Gather<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> together, and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> them <S%H4325>water.<s%>
<S%H227>Then<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7891>sang<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H7892>song,<s%> <S%H5927>Spring<s%> up, O <S%H875>well;<s%> <S%H6030>sing<s%> you to it:

The <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H2658>dig<s%> the <S%H875>well,<s%> the <S%H5081>nobles<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3738>dig<s%> it, by the direction of the <S%H2710>lawgiver,<s%> with their <S%H4938>staves.<s%> And from the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> they went to <S%H4980>Mattanah:<s%>
And from <S%H4980>Mattanah<s%> to <S%H5160>Nahaliel:<s%> and from <S%H5160>Nahaliel<s%> to <S%H1120>Bamoth:<s%>

And from <S%H1120>Bamoth<s%> in the <S%H1516>valley,<s%> that is in the <S%H7704>country<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> to the <S%H7218>top<s%> of <S%H6449>Pisgah,<s%> which <S%H8259>looks<s%> <S%H5921>toward<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H3452>Jeshimon.<s%>
And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Let me <S%H5674>pass<s%> through your <S%H776>land:<s%> we will not <S%H5186>turn<s%> into the <S%H7704>fields,<s%> or into the <S%H3754>vineyards;<s%> we will not <S%H8354>drink<s%> of the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of the <S%H875>well:<s%> but we will <S%H3212>go<s%> along by the <S%H4428>king's<s%> high <S%H1870>way,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> we be <S%H5674>past<s%> your <S%H1366>borders.<s%>

And <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> would not <S%H5414>suffer<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H5674>pass<s%> through his <S%H1366>border:<s%> but <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H622>gathered<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%> together, and <S%H3318>went<s%> out against <S%H3478>Israel<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness:<s%> and he <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3096>Jahaz,<s%> and <S%H3898>fought<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> him with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and <S%H3423>possessed<s%> his <S%H776>land<s%> from <S%H769>Arnon<s%> to <S%H2999>Jabbok,<s%> even to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon:<s%> for the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> was <S%H5794>strong.<s%>

And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H5892>cities:<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> in <S%H2809>Heshbon,<s%> and in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1323>villages<s%> thereof.

For <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%> was the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> <S%H1931>who<s%> had <S%H3898>fought<s%> against the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> and <S%H3947>taken<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H776>land<s%> out of his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> even to <S%H769>Arnon.<s%>

<S%H5921>Why<s%> <S%H3651><s%> they that speak in <S%H4911>proverbs<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H935>Come<s%> into <S%H2809>Heshbon,<s%> let the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> be <S%H1129>built<s%> and <S%H3559>prepared:<s%>

For there is a <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H3318>gone<s%> out of <S%H2809>Heshbon,<s%> a <S%H3852>flame<s%> from the <S%H7151>city<s%> of <S%H5511>Sihon:<s%> it has <S%H398>consumed<s%> <S%H6144>Ar<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> and the <S%H1167>lords<s%> of the <S%H1116>high<s%> places of <S%H769>Arnon.<s%>

<S%H188>Woe<s%> to you, <S%H4124>Moab!<s%> you are <S%H6>undone,<s%> O <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3645>Chemosh:<s%> he has <S%H5414>given<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> that <S%H6412>escaped,<s%> and his <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> into <S%H7628>captivity<s%> to <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites.<s%>

We have <S%H3384>shot<s%> at them; <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%> is <S%H6>perished<s%> even to <S%H1769>Dibon,<s%> and we have laid them <S%H8074>waste<s%> even to <S%H5302>Nophah,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> reaches to <S%H4311>Medeba.<s%>
Thus <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H7270>spy<s%> out <S%H3270>Jaazer,<s%> and they <S%H3920>took<s%> the <S%H1323>villages<s%> thereof, and <S%H3423>drove<s%> out the <S%H567>Amorites<s%> that were <S%H8033>there.<s%>

And they <S%H6437>turned<s%> and <S%H5927>went<s%> up by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan:<s%> and <S%H5747>Og<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out <S%H7125>against<s%> them, he, and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5971>people,<s%> to the <S%H4421>battle<s%> at <S%H154>Edrei.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H3372>Fear<s%> him not: for I have <S%H5414>delivered<s%> him into your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5971>people,<s%> and his <S%H776>land;<s%> and you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> to him as you <S%H6213>did<s%> to <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> at <S%H2809>Heshbon.<s%>

So they <S%H5221>smote<s%> him, and his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> there was <S%H1115>none<s%> <S%H7604>left<s%> him <S%H8300>alive:<s%> and they <S%H3423>possessed<s%> his <S%H776>land.<s%>
